text: I will establish my covenant with you. You shall go into the ark, you and your sons, your wife and your sons’ wives with you.
The sons of Kohath: Amram, Izhar, Hebron and Uzziel. Kohath lived one hundred and thirty-three years.

Siege of the Citadel. Those in the citadel were hemming Israel in around the sanctuary, continually trying to harm them and to strengthen the Gentiles.
